effect_size: Large for both (d=1.06 pain, d=1.24 sleep)
participants: 164 adults with OA and comorbid insomnia (ISI ≥15)
notes: Cannabidiol for Osteoarthritis and Insomnia: A Dual-Outcome RCT
abstract: CBD: WOMAC pain reduced 44% (12.8 → 7.2), ISI reduced 52% (18.3 → 8.8); Placebo: WOMAC reduced 15%, ISI reduced 18%
